details: Added some resources to the Note section in the Learn Python Basics page.
Added update.json file that contains update information.
Added updates section in Home page that displays data from the update.json file.
Added images from Flickr to the Learn Python Basics page that act as links to other websites.
Moved Note section into the accordion widget in the Learn Python Basics page.
Added one practice problem to Practice page.
Implemented accordion to Learn Python Basics page.
Added function that allows user to choose a practice problem in Practice page.
Added one practice problem to Practice page.
Added content to Home page, Learn Python Basics page, and Feedback page.
Added a Home page, Practice page, Learn Python Basics page, and Feedback page.
